learning.unsupervised

Class ClusteringAlg

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • learning.unsupervised.ClusteringAlg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBScan, FastKMeans, FastKMeansPlusPlus, GHPC, GHPKM, GKH, HarmonicKMeans, IntraImageKMeansAdapted, IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale, IntraImageKMeansWeighted, KernelGHPKM, KernelKMeans, KMeans, KMeansHubnessTester, KMeansPlusPlus, KMedoids, KMedoidsPlusPlus, LHPC, LKH, MTFastKMeans, MTFastKMeansPlusPlus

    public abstract class ClusteringAlg
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Citable
    This class implements the functionality for a clustering algorithm.

                                NeighborSetFinder nsfTest)
        Given the clustering model, determine assignments for newly observed points.

      • assignPointsToModelClusters

        public int[] assignPointsToModelClusters(DataSet dset,
                                NeighborSetFinder nsfTest,
                                float[][] kernelSimToTraining,
                                float[] selfKernels)
        Given the clustering model, determine assignments for newly observed points.
        Parameters:
        dset - Dataset.
        nsfTest - NeighborSetFinder object for the test data. Not always necessary.
        kernelSimToTraining - Kernel similarity array to training data.
        selfKernels - Kernel self-products.
        Returns:

      • getMinimizingClusters

        public Cluster[] getMinimizingClusters()
        Gets the configuration that had a minimum error function, instead of returning the final one. In most methods, the two are equivalent - but this does not need to be the case in general.
        Returns:
